meta.name: description
meta.content: Wylie ISD is a fast growing school system in southern Collin County, 24 miles northeast of metropolitan Dallas. Covering 41 square miles, the district serves more than 16,000 students at 20 campuses.

meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Wylie ISD, Wylie, Texas, TX, K-12, school, district, Collin County, Wylie Way
Wylie ISD is a fast growing school system in southern Collin County, 24 miles northeast of metropolitan Dallas. Covering 41 square miles, the district serves more than 16,000 students at 20 campuses.

meta.content: Wylie ISD is a fast growing school system in southern Collin County, 24 miles northeast of metropolitan Dallas. Covering 41 square miles, the district serves more than 16,000 students at 20 campuses.

a.title: Return to the homepage on the district site.

var multimediaGallery33949 = { "props": { "defaultGallery": true, "imageWidth" : 960, "imageHeight" : 500, "pageModuleInstanceId": "33949", "moduleInstanceId": "111748", "virtualFolderPath": "/cms/lib/TX01918453/Centricity/ModuleInstance/111748/" }, "records": [ { "flexDataId": "57391", "hideTitle": "False", "title": "Wylie ISD Virtual Job Fair", "hideCaption": "False", "caption": "April 30, 2020
9:00-11:30 am
Candidates will have the opportunity to “meet” administrators from each Wylie campus, and discuss current and future job opportunities all from the comfort of home!
If you have any questions, please contact Melissa Hefty at melissa.hefty@wylieisd.net", "imageSrc": "/cms/lib/TX01918453/Centricity/Domain/4/images/homepage/2019 Convocation 351.jpg", "imageWidth": "1500", "imageHeight": "848", "imageAltText": "Dr David Vinson presenting at Wylie ISD Convocation 2019.", "isLinked": "True", "linkUrl": "https://wylieisdjobfair.easyvirtualfair.com/prefair/", "linkText": "Register Now", "openLinkInNewWindow": "True", "videoLinkText": "", "videoIsEmbedded": "False", "videoIframe": "" }, { "flexDataId": "57175", "hideTitle": "False", "title": "Online Learning", "hideCaption": "False", "caption": "Wylie ISD is transitioning to online learning starting March 23, 2020.", "imageSrc": "/cms/lib/TX01918453/Centricity/Domain/4/images/homepage/online_learning_mmg.jpg", "imageWidth": "1500", "imageHeight": "848", "imageAltText": "Online Learning", "isLinked": "True", "linkUrl": "/Page/15370", "linkText": "Visit our Online Learning information page for more information.", "openLinkInNewWindow": "False", "videoLinkText": "", "videoIsEmbedded": "False", "videoIframe": "" }, { "flexDataId": "57154", "hideTitle": "False", "title": "COVID-19 Updates", "hideCaption": "False", "caption": "", "imageSrc": "/cms/lib/TX01918453/Centricity/Domain/4/images/homepage/COVID19_mmg.jpg", "imageWidth": "1500", "imageHeight": "848", "imageAltText": "Wylie ISD COVID-19", "isLinked": "True", "linkUrl": "/covid19", "linkText": "Visit our update page for the latest information", "openLinkInNewWindow": "False", "videoLinkText": "", "videoIsEmbedded": "False", "videoIframe": "" }, {}] };

div.span: [h1 style="text-align:center; text-transform:uppercase; text-shadow:1px 2px 5px rgba(0,0,0,.4);"]Stay In Touch[/h1][div style="letter-spacing:1.8px; text-align:center; font-family:Montserrat, sans-serif; font-weight:300; font-size:16px;"][p style="margin-bottom:-4px; line-height:1.5;"]951 South Ballard Avenue [br class="show960 hide768 show320"]Wylie, TX 75098[/p][p style="line-height:1.5; margin-bottom:27px;"][span style="font-size:21px;"]972.429.3000[/span][br]972.442.5368 (f)[/p][p][span style="margin-bottom:-4px; display:block; letter-spacing:0px; font-weight:700; font-size:14px;"]Download the Wylie ISD Mobile app today[/span][/p][div][a href="https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/wylie-isd/id1141053138?ls=1&mt=8" style="display:inline-block;"][img style="padding:0px 3px;" src="/cms/lib/TX01918453/Centricity/template/25/defaults/app-store.png" alt="Download on the App Store"/][/a][a href="http://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.blackboard.community.wylieisd" style="display:inline-block;"][img style="padding:0px 3px;" src="/cms/lib/TX01918453/Centricity/template/25/defaults/play-store.png" alt="Get it on Google Play"/][/a][/div][/div]

a.span: “Raider for Life” Mike Williams Announces Retirement

div.p: After 38 years as a teacher, coach and administrator, Wylie East High School principal Mike Williams has announced his retirement [more...]

a.title: Go to comments for “Raider for Life” Mike Williams Announces Retirement

div.p: Wylie ISD is now accepting applications for our CLAAS (Creating Leaders and Advocates for Schools) program. The program is for parents and community members with the desire to learn about the structure and operations of Wylie ISD can do so by committing to a yearlong journey that will give them an inside look at the District. Click for more information.

a.title: Go to comments for Wylie ISD CLAAS

a.span: New Assistant Superintendent for HR Announced

div.p: Wylie ISD is proud to announce that veteran educator Casey Whittle is returning to Wylie ISD as the Assistant Superintendent for Human [more...]

a.title: Go to comments for New Assistant Superintendent for HR Announced

iframe.style: border: none; overflow: hidden; width: 100%; height: 450px;

a.aria-label: Go to Google Map for Wylie ISD

div.p: The Wylie Independent School District does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, disability, or age in its programs and activities and provides equal access to the Boy Scouts and other designated youth groups. The following person has been designated to handle inquiries regarding the non-discrimination policies: Assistant Superintendent for Human Resources and Student Services | 951 S. Ballard Avenue, Wylie, TX 75098 | 972.429.3009.
